select
${grouptype},
count(1) as carcount,nvl(round(sum(t.gross)*0.001,3),0) as gross,nvl(round(sum(t.tare)*0.001,3),0) as tare, nvl(round(sum(t.suttle)*0.001,3),0) as suttle, nvl(round(sum(t.suttle-t.deduction) * 0.001, 3), 0) as suttleb, nvl(round(sum(t.deduction) * 0.001, 3), 0) as deduction, round((case when (sum(t.suttle) > 0 and sum(t.suttleb) > 0) then (sum(t.suttle) - sum(t.suttleb)) / sum(t.suttle) * 1000 else 0 end),2) as accordrate from m_measure_t t,m_operaconfig_t o where t.validflag > 0 and t.operatype=o.operatype
and ${selecttime}>= to_date(#{begintime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ${selecttime} <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and instr(t.planid,upper(#{planid}))>0
and instr(t.taskcode,#{taskcode})>0
and instr(t.carno,upper(#{carno}))>0
and instr(t.materialname,upper(#{materialname}))>0
and instr(t.targetname,upper(#{targetname}))>0
and instr(t.sourcename,upper(#{sourcename}))>0
and t.operatype = trim(#{operatype})
and t.cartype=#{cartype}
and o.materialflow=#{materialflow}
and (t.grossweighid =#{equname} or t.tareweighid = #{equname} or t.suttleweighid = #{equname})
group by ${grouptype}

select sum(carcount)carcount,sum(gross)gross,sum(tare)tare,sum(suttle)suttle,sum(deduction)deduction,sum(suttleb)suttleb from (select
${grouptype},
count(1) as carcount, nvl(round(sum(t.gross) * 0.001, 3), 0) as gross, nvl(round(sum(t.tare) * 0.001, 3), 0) as tare, nvl(round(sum(t.suttle) * 0.001, 3), 0) as suttle, nvl(round(sum(t.deduction) * 0.001, 3), 0) as deduction, nvl(round(sum(t.suttle-t.deduction) * 0.001, 3), 0) as suttleb from m_measure_t t,m_operaconfig_t o where t.validflag > 0 and t.operatype=o.operatype
and ${selecttime}>= to_date(#{begintime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and ${selecttime} <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and instr(t.planid,upper(#{planid}))>0
and instr(t.taskcode,#{taskcode})>0
and instr(t.carno,upper(#{carno}))>0
and instr(t.materialname,upper(#{materialname}))>0
and instr(t.targetname,upper(#{targetname}))>0
and instr(t.sourcename,upper(#{sourcename}))>0
and t.operatype = trim(#{operatype})
and t.cartype=#{cartype}
and o.materialflow=#{materialflow}
and (t.grossweighid =#{equname} or t.tareweighid = #{equname} or t.suttleweighid = #{equname})
)

select m.carno, nvl(m.tare*0.001,0)tare, to_char(m.taretime,'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') taretime, m.tareweigh, m.tareoperaname from m_tare_t m where m.validflag>0
and m.taretime>= to_date(#{begintime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and m.taretime <= to_date(#{endtime}, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and instr(carno,upper(#{carno}))>0
and m.cartype=#{cartype}
